column4: hey guys, if I use the daily-live  cd to install lucid instead of the beta release, will I have a rolling update into the next beta, or are betas an upgrade to obtain?
lets say you have a fully update copy of lucid. and beta 2 is released... do you obtain beta 2 by simply updating your packages or is it a full upgrade for the system
Yeah, just regular updates (but lucid support in #ubuntu+1)
